Kettering.Kettering Medical Center: Kettering Medical Center (KMC) is a faith-based, nonprofit hospital located in Kettering, Ohio, United States. Founded in 1964, it is the focus hospital in the Kettering Health Network with 508 beds, and is directly affiliated with the Seventh-day Adventist Church. The Boonshoft School of Medicine is an affiliated university situated on KMC's campus.
